name: Fio: Figure It Out!
summary:
Fio is a minimalistic puzzle game for mobile devices. The name is an anagram for “figure it out”, and this concept is a key aspect of the game.
The game starts out as a simple block moving game, but as players progress they are introduced to new mechanics that will require new ways of thinking about the puzzles.
Fio challenges players to figure out these mechanics for themselves rather than giving them instructions. That being said, the level structure was created in such a way that these concepts are introduced gently.
The focus of the game has been on helping players relax and de-stress while sharpening their logic skills in the process, and to realize how smart they are.
